Author: Bernardo94#7153
Content: Hello, I need help, I have atomic dex on my smartphone, but for days I try to enter and the screen only comes out in black, what should I do?

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: @Bernardo94 uninstall the app and install again, have your seed backed up, you'll have to enter it again.

Author: ubhillutd#3274
Content: This was dumb in my part, but I have the same problem as bernardo94. I may have misplaced my passphrase. I updated the app and all I get is a black screen. I'm worried if I uninstall and reinstall, I will lose whatever little coins I have on the app. Please advise.

Author: daemonfox#6136
Content: I see the update listed in play store and applied t. Works fine Google Pixel latest Android 10.

Author: daemonfox#6136
Content: orderbooks werent showing at first but I see orders now

Author: ca333#0118
Content:
@Bernardo94 delete the application and reinstall it as previously advised - that will resolve the "black screen issue" and also prevent it from reoccurring in the future. FYI This is a backwards compatibility problem caused when you have not done a clean install after upgrading from a pre 0.2.1 to a > 0.2.1 version. 

@ubhillutd contact our support team - they can guide you through the process of manually installing the old version (downgrading) and keeping the application data to hopefully extract your old seed. PLEASE back your seed up the next time as advised in the account setup.

Author: ubhillutd#3274
Content: I've contacted support. Will do. Sorry for the inconvenience. You guys rock!

Author: ca333#0118
Content: yes

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: üëç

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: I think it should stay closed source until the team recovers the funds they invested in making it.

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: Once you open source it, forget revenue.

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: Dexfees aren't significant enough to give it away for free. At least not with the current volume. Licensing is the way to go.

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: @PTYX makes a good point üôÇ

Author: Acura#2748
Content: I don't like much as a Dex Hodler. (Forget revenue üò¨)

Author: Acura#2748
Content: But maybe I don't have enough understanding for these things either.

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: @Acura as a dex holder you get revenue from anyone using the dex

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: Komodo being able to license their premium software doesn't affect you, in fact it benefits you. Without funds development would stall and there would be no incentive for users to use the DEX and hence, no dexfees for dex hodlers.

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: I'm confused why people think that free equals good. It's almost the opposite without a proper business model.

Author: Acura#2748
Content: Ok - thanks for the explanation
